question.title: JCE Cannot Authenticate Provider BC (bcprov-jdk18on-177.jar)
question.body:
I have been using some library which has dependency on bcprov-jdk18on-177.jar. Using Oracle Jre I am facing Exception:JCE Cannot Authenticate Provider BC.

Although it is working fine with OpenJDK provided by Amazon Corretto

  1. Add bouncycastle jar to JBoss classpath 2. Add 'org.bouncycastle.jce.provider.BouncyCastleProvider' to 'java.security' providers 3. Mark bouncycastle in your WAR as a 'provided' dependency. but still receiving same exception.
